alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:43PM MST until January 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches above 7500 feet, and 3 to 5 inches from 6000 to 7500 feet. * WHERE...West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet and Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet. * WHEN...From 3 AM Tuesday to 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads could be briefly closed.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
